ComicInfo.Summary:
T-Ray explains to Deadpool that the four Deadpool impersonators are parts of his actual personality that he plans on killing off. Can the real Deadpool get to them before T-Ray does?
T-Ray informs Deadpool that the new Deadpool's are parts of Deadpool's personality that T-Ray has ripped from his psyche. And T-Ray is hunting them down and killing them. But Deadpool throws a wrench in the gears by reversing the polarity of the weapon T-Ray used on Deadpool to split his personality and put his personalities in T-Ray. This somehow proves that Deadpool is the real Wade Wilson or does it?
ComicInfo.Title: Funeral for a Freak, Part 4 of 4: Deadpoolalooza
